name: Xena: Warrior Princess
description: Xena: Warrior Princess is a hack and slash action video game developed by VU Games and published by Electronic Arts for the PlayStation in 1999. A Game Boy Color version was developed and published by Titus Software in 2001. A PlayStation 2 version, developed by EM Studios and published by Blast! Entertainment, was released exclusively in PAL territories in 2006. Each version is based on the television series, Xena: Warrior Princess, which aired from 1995 to 2001.
